input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GIP ATLANPOLE (44). Summary: Intellectual Services for Carrying out Experiments Based on the Use of Artificial Intelligence Technologies in Pays De La Loire (Edih Diva). Description: Framework agreement for subsequent contracts relating to the selection of 10 ESN service providers who will support Loire companies in carrying out experimental proofs based on Artificial Intelligence (POC IA DIVA) for a total amount of EUR 1,026,000 including tax. The maximum amount of each POC IA DIVA service is 38,000 EUR including tax.<br> The production of experimental proofs (POC IA DIVA) is the subject of an operation co-financed by the European Regional Development Fund (FEDER 21-27).<br> This framework agreement is multi-awarded in application of article R.2162-11 of the code of public procurement. The maximum number of beneficiaries of the Framework Agreement is limited to 10 (ten) service providers, subject to having received a sufficient number of offers which will be put back into competition pursuant to article R2162-10 of the CCP. It is executed by the conclusion of subsequent contracts in application of articles R.2162-2, R.2162-7 et seq. of the CCP.<br> LOT-0001<br> This consultation of this framework agreement for subsequent procurement concerns on the selection of service providers who will carry out experimental proof services (POC IA DIVA). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ENSUES LA REDONNE TOWN HALL. Summary: Management of the Information System of the Town of Ensues La Redonne. Description: The town of ENSUES LA REDONNE wishes to entrust the management of the information system to a service provider. The service must support the future IT challenges of the ENSUES LA REDONNE town hall in a process of progress plans and be able to respond to the development needs of organization and changes. The objectives of the service are to obtain quality service provision to users in terms of responsiveness, availability, traceability and visibility. The Service Provider must put in place the areas of progress necessary to this optimization in conjunction with the management of the ENSUES LA REDONNE town hall and the project manager. The ENSUES LA REDONNE town hall wishes to initiate a process of outsourcing its applications from 2027: messaging, office data via Share Point and its business software (mode SAAS). The removal of the existing VMWare 6.5 host server in order to update its information system as well as switch to a new hypervisor for AD Management and host certain VMs, is in progress. course.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-04. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Management of the Information System of the Town of Ensues La Redonne

The service must support the future IT challenges of the ENSUES LA REDONNE town hall in a process of progress plans and be able to respond to the development needs of organization and changes. The objectives of the service are to obtain quality service provision to users in terms of responsiveness, availability, traceability and visibility. The Service Provider must put in place the areas of progress necessary to this optimization in conjunction with the management of the ENSUES LA REDONNE town hall and the project manager. The ENSUES LA REDONNE town hall wishes to initiate a process of outsourcing its applications from 2027: messaging, office data via Share Point and its business software (mode SAAS). The removal of the existing VMWare 6.5 host server in order to update its information system as well as switch to a new hypervisor for AD Management and host certain VMs, is in progress. course.

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CITY OF VILLEURBANNE. Summary: Relaunch - Acquisition and Maintenance of Automation Equipment Based on Rfid Technology for the Management and Lending of Media Library Collections in the City of Villeurbanne. Description: estimated start date of the market The city of Villeurbanne provides its 162,000 inhabitants with a public reading network made up of two bookmobiles, an EACS service (artistic, cultural and scientific education) and three media libraries: the Maison du livre de l'image and sound, the Tonkin media library and the Rize media library. With 16,628 active users and 330,000 borrowable documents, all media (books, periodicals, CDs, DVDs, games, etc.), all of these establishments operate in a network under the Syracuse (Archimed) document management system and carry out approximately 1.7 million annual loan and return transactions. The project consists of the implementation, in the three media libraries, of an RFID self-service system for borrowing documents meeting the expectations and needs of the public and professionals. This consultation follows the initial consultation (reference: n2025_7886) which was declared without further action due to the need for the City to redefine its need. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-08. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Relaunch - Acquisition and Maintenance of Automation Equipment Based on Rfid Technology for the Management and Lending of Media Library Collections in the City of Villeurbanne

With 16,628 active users and 330,000 borrowable documents, all media (books, periodicals, CDs, DVDs, games, etc.), all of these establishments operate in a network under the Syracuse (Archimed) document management system and carry out approximately 1.7 million annual loan and return transactions. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ASSOCIATION AGS. Summary: Office Supplies, Paper, Current Furniture and Small it Equipment 2026-2029. Description: The purpose of this contract is the supply and delivery of office supplies, reception, paper; computer supplies and accessories as well as current office furniture, intended for the needs of the AGS Association (metropolitan sites exclusively). AGS sites located in DROMS are excluded from this market. As part of its policy of responsible purchasing and reduction of environmental impact, particular attention will be paid to the environmental performance and the composition of the products offered. As such, priority will be given to eco-designed products, recycled or recyclable, bearing an official ecolabel (European Ecolabel, NF Environnement, PEFC, FSC, etc.) or presenting equivalent characteristics in terms of environmental impact, sustainability and waste management. The Sustainable Development criterion (5 points) is evaluated on the basis of the labels, certifications and environmental commitments described in the technical brief. output.Description: The purpose of this contract is the supply and delivery of office supplies, reception, paper; computer supplies and accessories as well as current office furniture, intended for the needs of the AGS Association (metropolitan sites exclusively). AGS sites located in DROMS are excluded from this market. As part of its policy of responsible purchasing and reduction of environmental impact, particular attention will be paid to the environmental performance and the composition of the products offered. As such, priority will be given to eco-designed products, recycled or recyclable, bearing an official ecolabel (European Ecolabel, NF Environnement, PEFC, FSC, etc.) or presenting equivalent characteristics in terms of environmental impact, sustainability and waste management. The Sustainable Development criterion (5 points) is evaluated on the basis of the labels, certifications and environmental commitments described in the technical brief. The contract is allocated as follows: Lot n1: Office supplies, reception and paper Lot n2: Current office furniture Lot n3: Equipment and supplies IT

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DEPARTMENT OF SEINE-MARITIME. Summary: Supply of Small Exhibition and Conservation Equipment for the Sites and Museums of the Department of Seine Maritime and for the Departmental Media Library. Description: The Department of Seine-Maritime owns and manages six sites and museums:<br> - The Cleres Park,<br> - La Maison Vacquerie - Victor Hugo Museum (museum of France),<br> - The Museum of Norman Traditions and Arts - Chateau de Martainville (museum of France),<br> - Jumieges Abbey,<br> - The Gardens of Saint-Georges Abbey,<br> - The Roman theater of Lillebonne.<br> These cultural sites are both places of permanent or temporary exhibitions and places of conservation. Furthermore, two of the six sites are labeled Musee de France, which implies standards and constraints. particular on conservation.<br> Furthermore, the Department manages the departmental archives, the preservation and promotion of a departmental collection of works of art as well as the management of the departmental media library which, as part of its missions, is required to equip and repair a certain number of documents (books, CDs, DVDs) on site. For this it is necessary to acquire specific supplies.<br> Also to fulfill these functions of exhibition, promotion and conservation, the Department of Seine-Maritime must equip itself with equipment allowing the realization logistics of exhibitions (bases, frames, room furniture, etc.) as well as equipment used for the preventive conservation of collections on site (conservation boxes, collection marking equipment, specific papers, etc.).<br> The expected services are described in CCP<br> Material.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PAYS DE LA LOIRE REGION. Summary: Establishment of a Project Resource Center. Description: The purpose of this framework agreement is the implementation of a project resource center. 1. 1 - Context In order to successfully complete all the priority projects of the regional roadmap, the Digital Transformation Department (DTN) wishes to establish a project resource center. This device will allow the community to mobilize experts, whose mission will be to support the gradual increase in skills of regional agents, while strengthening the quality and efficiency of the implementation of certain priority projects... These experts in project methodology have the mission to raise awareness among regional agents and develop their project management skills. In order to strengthen this support role, they become more involved with agents by offering personalized monitoring, practical workshops adapted to the needs expressed, as well as ongoing support. throughout the project life cycle. The project resource center is designed in a transversal manner and aims to work with all business departments to guarantee the success of their digital projects. 1. 2 - Challenges The project resource center constitutes a lever strategic for the digital transformation of the Region. It is based on a clear structuring of services, strong demands on the profiles mobilized, adapted tools, and an integrated approach to skills management and innovation. The success of this device depends.... Published Date: 2025-10-27. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: As part of the evolution of its needs in terms of information systems, the Creil Sud Oise Agglomeration and the Creil town hall wish to overhaul their physical server infrastructures. This approach is part of a desire for modernization and optimization of performance and security of IT environments serving users and internal services. The technical specifications are described in the specific technical clauses booklet. The technical specifications are described in the specific technical clauses booklet. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: METROPOLIS OF LYON. Summary: Implementation of a Remote Digital Support Service for Users. Description: As part of its strategy dedicated to combating the digital divide, the Metropolis of Lyon wishes to provide concrete solutions to make the daily lives of its residents easier. It thus wishes to act on all the issues linked to digital inclusion, that is to say: - animation, tools and training for field professionals; - access to equipment, as well as the internet; - support for digital uses to lead to the autonomy of metropolitan residents. Through this market, the community wishes to increase the number of solutions allowing users in a situation of digital fragility to have a response in the event of difficulty. This is why the Metropolis plans to maintain and perpetuate its remote digital support service for its residents, in good complementarity with existing systems such as digital advisors. Description: This procedure with negotiation concerns Datacenter outsourcing hosting health data on behalf of GCS TESIS and its members. This procedure with negotiation is subject to the provisions of articles R.2161-12 to R.2161-20 of Decree No. 2018-1075 of December 3, 2018 of the Public Order Code. The use of this procedure is motivated by the fact that the Contracting Authority is objectively not able to define the technical specifications with sufficient precision in referring to a standard, a European technical assessment, a common technical specification or a technical reference system. For security and transfer of responsibilities issues, allotment is not considered. An information note in supplement to the call for competition presents in particular the GCS TESIS and its members, the regional data center and its approval, existing infrastructures and usage statistics.. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: AUVERGNE-RHÔNE-ALPES ENTREPRISES. Summary: Implementation of an Accounting Solution. Description: This consultation is to make available and maintenance in operational conditions of an ERP type accounting software in SaaS mode ("Software-as-A-Service") as well as any additional modules, for the benefit of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Entreprises agency. This solution aims to meet the following objectives: automate key processes to reduce manual tasks, limit the risk of errors and gain productivity; Dematerialize financial flows in order to centralize information, facilitate their access and improve traceability; structure and formalize exchanges between operational teams and the Finance service, with integrated and secure workflows; Replace Excel work files with collaborative and secure tools, integrated into the accounting solution; prepare the company for electronic invoicing and upcoming regulatory developments. The whole services expected for the market are specified within the specific technical clauses (CCTP), presented in PowerPoint format.. Published Date: 2025-10-01. Closing Date: 2025-10-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Implementation of an Accounting Solution

This solution aims to meet the following objectives: automate key processes to reduce manual tasks, limit the risk of errors and gain productivity; Dematerialize financial flows in order to centralize information, facilitate their access and improve traceability; structure and formalize exchanges between operational teams and the Finance service, with integrated and secure workflows; Replace Excel work files with collaborative and secure tools, integrated into the accounting solution; prepare the company for electronic invoicing and upcoming regulatory developments. The whole services expected for the market are specified within the specific technical clauses (CCTP), presented in PowerPoint format.

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SPL O.P.E. DARE FOR EDUCATION. Summary: Supply and Maintenance of a Human Resources Information System (sirh) in "saas" Mode (sofware As a Service). Description: In order to improve the management of its human resources and optimize the quality of service, the SPL OPE wishes to set up a human resources information system (SIRH). The main objective is to improve the quality of the service while reducing errors, by simplifying HR management, optimizing internal processes and ensuring better planning of teams. A more effective management of human resources is essential to support the mission of animation of schools. The implementation of SIRH aims to: -Digitalize and automate HR processes, in particular staff administration, payroll, recruitment, training and planning of activities. Centralize HR data management, for simplified access and use. reactive.-Fluidify the transmission of data within the HR service, for collaborative and effective management of information.-Reduction the time spent on low added value tasks, allowing teams to focus on strategic missions.. Published Date: 2025-09-22. Closing Date: 2025-10-28. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Supply and Maintenance of a Human Resources Information System (sirh) in "saas" Mode (sofware As a Service)

A more effective management of human resources is essential to support the mission of animation of schools.
